attributes.additional_details:
The decision making should be data driven and on scientific basis, nothing more or less. Last time government went with decision making on political grounds we ended up with higher incidences of Indian variant (delta) of the deadly disease. 
If 20 new cases per 100000 population is safe then Pakistan certainly qualifies for Amber list downgrade.
attributes.background:
Pakistan was put in the red list before its neighbouring countries and they are now been taken out whereas Pakistan remains in the redlist. 
India has new infection rate of 20 per 100000 whereas Pakistan has 14 per 100000.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below two petitions which are currently open on the topic:

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974

Remove Bangladesh and Pakistan from the Government red list
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582337
